00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 #include <string.h>

00028 #include "logImageCore.h"

00030 #include "logmemfile.h" /* own include */
00031 
00032 int logimage_fseek(void* logfile, intptr_t offsett, int origin)
00033 {   
00034     struct _Log_Image_File_t_ *file = (struct _Log_Image_File_t_*) logfile;
00035     intptr_t offset = offsett;
00036     
00037     if (file->file) fseek(file->file, offset, origin);
00038     else { /*we're seeking in memory*/
00039         if (origin==SEEK_SET) {
00040             if (offset > file->membuffersize) return 1;
00041             file->memcursor = file->membuffer + offset;
00042         }
00043         else if (origin==SEEK_END) {
00044             if (offset > file->membuffersize) return 1;
00045             file->memcursor = (file->membuffer + file->membuffersize) - offset;
00046         }
00047         else if (origin==SEEK_CUR) {
00048             uintptr_t pos = (uintptr_t)file->membuffer - (uintptr_t)file->memcursor;
00049             if (pos + offset > file->membuffersize) return 1;
00050             if (pos < 0) return 1;
00051             file->memcursor += offset;
00052         }
00053     }
00054     return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 int logimage_fwrite(void *buffer, unsigned int size, unsigned int count, void *logfile)
00058 {
00059     struct _Log_Image_File_t_ *file = (struct _Log_Image_File_t_*) logfile;
00060     if (file->file) return fwrite(buffer, size, count, file->file);
00061     else { /*we're writing to memory*/
00062         /*do nothing as this isn't supported yet*/
00063         return count;
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 int logimage_fread(void *buffer, unsigned int size, unsigned int count, void *logfile)
00068 {
00069     struct _Log_Image_File_t_ *file = (struct _Log_Image_File_t_*) logfile;
00070     if (file->file) return fread(buffer, size, count, file->file);
00071     else { /*we're reading from memory*/
00072         int i;
00073         /* we convert ot uchar just on the off chance some platform can't handle
00074          * pointer arithmetic with type (void*). */
00075         unsigned char *buf = (unsigned char *) buffer; 
00076         
00077         for (i=0; i<count; i++) {
00078             memcpy(buf, file->memcursor, size);
00079             file->memcursor += size;
00080             buf += size;
00081         }
00082         return count;
00083     }
00084 }
